member.name: T:AODL.Collections.CollectionWithEvents
member.summary: The events for all collections used within AODL

member.name: M:AODL.Collections.CollectionWithEvents.OnClearComplete
member.summary: Executes additional processes after content deleted

member.name: M:AODL.Collections.CollectionWithEvents.OnInsert(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes additional processes before deleting an object.
member.param: Zero based index which should be inserted

member.name: M:AODL.Collections.CollectionWithEvents.OnInsertComplete(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes additional processes after inserting a new object
member.param: Zero based index which should be inserted

member.name: M:AODL.Collections.CollectionWithEvents.OnRemove(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes additional processes while deleting an object
member.param: The zero based index of the object to delete

member.name: M:AODL.Collections.CollectionWithEvents.OnRemoveComplete(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes additional processes after an object is deleted
member.param: Th zero based index, of the object which was deleted

member.summary: ContentCollection, a ListItem could have another List inside (Inner List)

member.name: M:AODL.TextDocument.Content.Paragraph.#ctor(AODL.TextDocument.TextDocument,AODL.TextDocument.Style.ParentStyles,System.String)
member.summary: Overloaded constructor. Use this to create a standard paragraph with the given text from string simpletext. Notice, the text will be styled as standard. You won't be able to style it bold, underline, etc. this will only occur if standard style attributes of the textdocument are set to this.
member.param: The only accepted ParentStyle is Standard! All other styles will be ignored!
The text which should be append within this paragraph.
